name: Kuma Conflict
description:
Kuma Conflict is an asymmetric local multi-player game with 4 players. One player is going to play as a huge bear to destroy houses and smash other three players. Other 3 players are going to play as 3 army leaders, to recruit soldiers from houses and defeat the bear, or fight with each other. Each characters also have a distinct ability, like dashing, shooting fire ball, or casting magical shield.

To play this game, you need 4 players and 4 controllers.

Created by: Jackson Westbrook, Jeffrey Xue, and Heidi Bang
